version_description:
FIXED: audio player timing out when the screen goes off
FIXED: email confirmations not going out to some users
FIXED: various login issues in the Network portion of the app
FIXED: unable to edit profile photo
FIXED: map doesn't move to a new location after search
NEW: user sign-up form now has email confirmation field to avoid misspelled addresses

FIXED: editing / adding profile photo caused crashes for some users

FIXED: users now alerted if the device "location services" aren't turned on, which was causing the dreaded "spinning circle of sadness" on the map screen for some

FIXED: empty conversations are no longer showing up in messages list

FIXED: user profile form is no longer visible in app settings before an account is created

FIXED: searching on map screen stopped showing Google results

NEW: additional guidance and checks for correct username format (lowercase, max #of characters, etc.)

Fixed an issue causing some users to not receive phone notifications for messages

New sign-up form guidance for the phone number field

- NEW: Users can now directly update their usernames and email addresses (via Settings)
- NEW: Map distance units can be toggled between miles and kilometers (via Settings)
- NEW: User profile edits and logout functions have been moved from the map screen to Settings
- NEW: Coherent Thought Sequencing audio overview added to CE5 Guide
- NEW: Audio throughout app updated to higher quality and smaller file sizes
- FIXED: Bugs with message notifications, as reported by some users
- Updated settings to reflect newest app version

NEW: Offline mode for the CE5 Process is now built into the app. Internet no longer required!

NEW: Visit most sections of the app and content will be cached locally for use without an internet connection.

NEW: Messages now available to read offline

FIXED: Multiple message notification issues reported by users

FIXED: Username edits causing issues due to disallowed characters

FIXED: Recommended reading section items not opening on newer devices

NEW: button added to settings to allow clearing of downloaded (cached) content

FIXED: minor user interface adjustments
